title: The 2022 Super Bowl Ads Return to Travel, Familiar Faces and New Tech - The Wall Street Journal
content: The 2022 Super Bowl Ads Return to Travel, Familiar Faces and New Tech  The Wall Street Journal
description: The second Super Bowl of the Covid-19 pandemic on Sunday featured a variety of first-time advertisers, including a slew of financial technology and cryptocurrency players, plus the return of travel ads to the game.
